results.title: Further evidence for the involvement of cardiac beta-adrenergic receptors in right ventricle hypertrophy and ascites in broiler chickens.
results.text_hl: Exposure of @SPECIES_9031 @@@chick@@@ embryos to high @CHEMICAL_Carbon_Dioxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002245 @@@CO(2)@@@ levels reduced the binding capacity of myocardial beta-adrenergic receptors compared with those embryos incubated at the normal @CHEMICAL_Carbon_Dioxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002245 @@@CO(2)@@@ level. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@-supplemented diet numerically reduced @<m>DISEASE_Ascites</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@ incidence in broiler @SPECIES_9031 @@@chickens@@@ (7%) compared with birds fed the control diet (15%).

citations.NLM: Hassanzadeh M, Buyse J, Decuypere E. Further evidence for the involvement of cardiac beta-adrenergic receptors in right ventricle hypertrophy and ascites in broiler chickens. Avian Pathol. 2002 Apr;31(2):177-81. PMID: 12396363
citations.BibTeX: @article{12396363, title={Further evidence for the involvement of cardiac beta-adrenergic receptors in right ventricle hypertrophy and ascites in broiler chickens.}, author={Hassanzadeh M and Buyse J and Decuypere E}, journal={Avian Pathol}, volume={31}, number={2}, pages={177-81}}

results.title: [Case presentation in small animal medicine. What is your diagnosis?].
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@Atrial fibrillation@@@ and @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@ were diagnosed in a 9-year old boxer who was examined because of @DISEASE_Anorexia @DISEASE_MESH:D000855 @@@anorexia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ascites</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@. Longterm treatment included a diuretic (@CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@), an ACE-inhibitor (@CHEMICAL_benazepril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044946 @@@benazepril@@@), @CHEMICAL_Digoxin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004077 @@@digoxin@@@, and a betablocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@).

citations.NLM: Gut M, Glaus TM, Suter PF. [Case presentation in small animal medicine. What is your diagnosis?]. Schweiz Arch Tierheilkd. 1998;140(8):337-40. PMID: 9719733
citations.BibTeX: @article{9719733, title={[Case presentation in small animal medicine. What is your diagnosis?].}, author={Gut M and Glaus TM and Suter PF}, journal={Schweiz Arch Tierheilkd}, volume={140}, number={8}, pages={337-40}}
